nodes.text: Halin Azucca was a human female who led the Opposition, a performance art troupe on the moon of the Inner Rim planet Pijal. Azucca and the performers' aim was to inform the Pijali of the problems facing Pijal through political art. In 40 BBY, they were framed by traitorous members of the royal guard led by Captain Deren, who, along with Princess Fanry, initiated a revolution against the Czerka Corporation's control of the Pijal system.
Halin Azucca appeared in Master & Apprentice, a 2019 novel written by Claudia Gray.
